article_title: The Lesson Of Trump Is You Should Argue With Your Own Team

article_metadata.author: Modeled Behavior

og.description: Trump's success is a coat of many colors, arising from a patchwork of economic, social, political, and cultural conditions. Not to mention the part attributable to the extraordinary nature of Trump himself. But I do think one piece of the blame lies with conservatives lack of willingness to argue with themselves. This [...]
